about_the_game:
Defender OF Falyndor is a First-Person Virtual Reality Tower Defense game where you take control of your character, towers, and much more to defend Falyndor from waves of invasions. Place and upgrade towers, support structures, and vehicles to help defend the realm or purchase some serious firepower and do it yourself with boots on the ground! In Defender of Falyndor, each run will be different than the last as you build your world one tile at a time and face greater and greater threats with each passing day!

FEATURES
  • First person combat against an ever-growing army of Bots who's only objectives are to bring Falyndor to ruin.
  • Visit the Item Shop to purchase upgrades for your Towers, your weapons, or yourself.
  • Take direct control of your towers to combine your strengths and really cause some damage!
  • Choose from a selection of over 50 different tiles to build out a different world every time you play!

In Defender of Falyndor, each run will be different than the last as you build your world one tile at a time and face greater and greater threats with each passing day!

  • Visit the Item Shop to purchase upgrades for your Towers, your weapons, or yourself.

name: Defender Of Falyndor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 3060 Series or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR: Quest Headsets or Better

short_description: Defender OF Falyndor is a First-Person Tower Defense game in Virtual Reality! Take control of your character, towers, and much more to protect Falyndor from waves of invasions to become the ultimate Defender of Falyndor!
